column4: hi there. I'm on my way to configure my kernel. (using 2.6.26 source) I figured out that my cpu has the "AMD K10" arch. This kernel doesnt support optimization for this arch. Which shell I choose?
ok, I was going to ask, "why not use a later kernel?"  :)
I thought at some point they got rid of that, and just put all the optimizations into modules that are loaded at run time.
